page.title: 12TOURISM CRESSBROOK WARDLOW
page.content: ACCOMMODATION Many farmhouses and cottages offer bed and breakfast,at prices ranging from Â£8-Â£10,per night. Morning coffee,teas and accommodation are obtainable at Upperdale farm. The Bull's Head at Wardlow provides a full menu every evening and Sunday lunchtime. There is a youth hostel at Ravenstor, and accommodation at the pub at Monsal Head. SELF-CATERING cottages have been converted from old stables at Cressbrook Hall,a fine old country hall.These are suitable for disabled visitors. Mains water and electricity are supplied to cottages and farms.Not all dwellings are connected to the main sewers.There is no gas in the area.
